name: pheochromocytoma
definition: An endocrine organ benign neoplasm that arises within the adrenal medulla, releasing epinephrines and norepinephrines hormones that cause either episodic or persistent high blood pressure. [url:https\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pheochromocytoma, url:https\://rarediseases.info.nih.gov/diseases/7385/pheochromocytoma, url:https\://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/pheochromocytoma/symptoms-causes/syc-20355367, url:https\://www.omim.org/entry/171300]

clinicalTrials.title: Study of Axitinib (AG-013736) With Evaluation of the VEGF-pathway in Pheochromocytoma/Paraganglioma
Radioactive Drug (177Lu-DOTATATE) for the Treatment of Locally Advanced, Metastatic, or Unresectable Rare Endocrine Cancers
